trans-unit.source: Provides a strongly typed collection for <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> objects and implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface to support navigating through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 提供的强类型的集合<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref>对象和实现<xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref>接口以支持在集合中导航。

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapNodeCollection class provides a strongly typed collection for <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: SiteMapNodeCollection 类提供的强类型的集合<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: It stores <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects internally in a zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: 它将存储<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>内部中从零开始的数组的对象。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: You can modify a SiteMapNodeCollection collection when it is first created, and then use the following methods to add, copy, and remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects: - To add <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改 SiteMapNodeCollection 集合时首次创建，，然后使用以下方法来添加、 复制和删除<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象:-若要添加<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: - To copy <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -为复制<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: - To remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -若要删除<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，请使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: You can create a read-only SiteMapNodeCollection, which does not permit adding, copying, nor removing <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, by using the static <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建只读 SiteMapNodeCollection，不允许添加、 复制和删除<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，使用静态<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapNodeCollection collections that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> methods are read-only, as is the SiteMapNodeCollection that is returned when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> property is accessed on a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that is returned from a provider.
trans-unit.target: 通过返回的 SiteMapNodeCollection 集合<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A>方法是只读的作为是时返回 SiteMapNodeCollection<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A>上访问属性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>从提供程序返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown, if you attempt to modify a read-only SiteMapNodeCollection by setting the default indexer property or by using any of the following methods: - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> Use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check the collection before calling any of the methods in the preceding list.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常，如果你尝试修改只读 SiteMapNodeCollection，通过设置的默认索引器属性或通过使用任何以下方法:- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A>-<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>属性检查集合，然后再调用上面的列表中的任何方法。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref>类，它是默认实例。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 将整个集合复制到兼容的一维数组，从目标数组的指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method delegates to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which accounts for the possible exceptions that are listed in "Exceptions."
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 方法委托给<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，哪些帐户已列出在"异常。"的可能异常</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that must have zero-based indexing and is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 必须具有从零开始的索引，并且是从复制的元素的目标的一维数组<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中的从零开始索引`array`复制开始处。

trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index小于零。

trans-unit.target: array是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of objects in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
trans-unit.target: -数源中的对象大于从的可用空间index到末尾array。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is synchronized, other threads can still modify the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>是同步，其他线程仍可以修改<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>，这将导致枚举数引发异常。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes that are made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，你可以锁定<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>在整个枚举期间或捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The index of the value, in the list, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 索引的值，在列表中，如果找到了;否则为-1。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection in the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将一项插入集合中<xref:System.Collections.IList>的指定索引处的接口。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IList.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based `index` at which to insert `value`.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始`index`在其中插入`value`。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: 要插入到<xref:System.Collections.IList>。</xref:System.Collections.IList>的对象

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示集合是否具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref>只读的; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>值，该值指示集合是否只读的。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref>只读的; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Collections.IList> element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Collections.IList>的指定索引处的元素。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specified object from the collection in the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 从在集合中移除指定对象的第一个匹配项<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: 要从<xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>中删除的对象

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Collections.IList> item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 删除<xref:System.Collections.IList>的指定索引处的项。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hierarchical data item for the specified enumerated item.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的枚举项的层次结构数据项。

trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The object for which to return an <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 为其返回对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"></xref> that represents the object passed to the IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"> </xref>表示传递给 IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData 的对象。
